price: Nerede onlarda öğüt almak? Hâlbuki kendilerine apaçık bir rasûl gelmişti.
arabic: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ وَقَدۡ جَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: annā lahumu al-dhik'rā waqad jāahum rasūlun mubīnun
